sentences.english: The traditional measurement is completed by a multiple-site joint way.
sentences.chinese: 传统的光学测量方法是采取多站交汇方法完成测量。

sentences.english: Trans station interference is a distant interference of the same frequency in multi station microwave transmission.
sentences.chinese: 越站干扰是微波多站传输中的一种同频远端干扰。
